CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Opportunity Recorded", 0, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Prospect Qualified", 1, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Value Proposition Presented", 2, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Proposal Submitted", 3, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Contract Signed", 4, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Live", 4, IF (TEXT(StageName) = "Proposal Lost", 0 , 0 )))))))
CustomField.label: Stage #
